duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify qualified candidates through various channels and assess their suitability through interviews, skills testing, and reference checks.
Participate in sales role plays, review sales strategies, and integrate sales skills into the recruiting process.
Cold call to set new meetings and attend meetings with current account executives to learn the sales process.
Maintain and develop client relationships, generate sales leads, and negotiate client contracts.
Assist, develop, and manage a team of recruiters, meeting and exceeding quotas consistently.
Serve as the point of contact for candidates and clients, resolving any issues that may arise.
